articles.title: Cheslin Kolbe kicks 50m drop goal as Toulouse win French Top 14 - News24
articles.description: Toulouse beat La Rochelle to win the French Top 14 for a record-extending 21st time and to clinch a European and domestic double.
articles.content: Toulouse head coach Ugo Mola, who beat the same opposition in May's Champions Cup final, started Thomas Ramos at flyhalf in place of fellow France international Romain Ntamack who was sidelined with … [+1812 chars]

articles.content: The European Space Agency hopes to hire and launch the world's first physically disabled astronaut and several hundred would-be para-astronauts have already applied for the role, ESA head Josef Aschb… [+2340 chars]

articles.title: Ibiza and Majorca hit out at UK tourists: Balearics urge Spain to back EU's tough stance - Express
articles.description: GREEN LIST destinations are now urging European Union governments to tighten rules for UK arrivals due to concerns about the Delta variant.

articles.title: Euro 2020: The Group of Death may have KILLED fatigued France's hopes - Daily Mail
articles.description: France stride wearily east to Bucharest on Friday, the next staging post in their attempt to add the European title to the World Cup.Perhaps the F was for fatigue. France emerged battered and bruised.

articles.author: Emmet Gates
articles.title: UEFA rule change leaves Liverpool at a disadvantage, and Jürgen Klopp won't be happy - Liverpool.com
articles.description: The away goal rule has been axed by the European governing body after 56 years, and the resulting change will mean Liverpool and other teams in European competition face the potential of more game time.
articles.content: The away goal rule in European competition is no more. After 56 years, Uefa have called time on the law. "It is no longer appropriate for an away goal to carry more weight," said Uefa president Aleks… [+4037 chars]
